items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t want to go to the dance with Mary.
We know Tom will do whatever we tell him to do.
What have you been doing these past few months?
Tom pretended that what Mary said didn\'t hurt.
I suspect Tom will probably regret what he did.
I\'m not interested in anything Tom has to say.
Don\'t worry, you\'ll get your voice back soon.
Without your help, Tom would\'ve probably died.
Would someone mind telling me what\'s going on?
I had a similar problem when I lived in Boston.
